display_long_description:
Novobeing is a VR well-being application that combines meditation, breathwork, music, and multisensory environments to help you achieve relaxation effortlessly.

Download our demo app for free and immerse yourself in 10 multisensory meditation and breathwork experiences, designed to help you relax, quiet your mind, and cultivate positive thoughts and emotions. By transporting you to tranquil meditative states, Novobeing facilitates stress relief, mental clarity, and inner peace.

Unlock the healing power of your breath with meditation experiences that are tailored to your mood and stress levels and change your mental state on-demand with: 

✅ Proven Breathing Techniques
✅ Animations to time your breath
✅ Environments that naturally boost your mood
✅ Music that makes you feel amazing

These sample experiences provide just a glimpse into some of the immersive well-being experiences that are available on Novobeing. Learn more about our technology by visiting: https://www.novobeing.com/
